en: Peppa and George are going to the playgroup.
zh: 乔治和佩奇一起去幼儿园。

en: It is George's first day.
zh: 这是乔治第一天去幼儿园。

en: George, are you looking forward to the playgroup?
zh: 乔治，你是不是很期待去幼儿园呢？

en: Daddy, maybe George is too small to go to my playgroup?
zh: 爸爸，乔治会不会年纪太小不适合上幼儿园啊？

en: He'll be fine, Peppa.
There'll be you and Mr. Dinosaur there to keep him company.
zh: 有你和恐龙先生陪在他身边。

en: But I want to play with the big children!
zh: 但我想和大一点的小朋友玩！

en: Not George and his toy dinosaur.
zh: 不想和乔治和他的恐龙玩具玩。

en: Oh dear, Peppa doesn't want George to go to her playgroup.
zh: 哦，天啊，佩奇不想和乔治一起去幼儿园。

en: We're here!
Daddy, are you sure George is big enough?
zh: 爸爸，你确定乔治能上幼儿园吗?

en: He'll be fine.
Alright, he can come.
Bye bye.
Madame Gazelle looks after the children at the playgroup.
zh: 羚羊夫人在照看幼儿园里的小朋友。

en: Hello! This is my little brother, George.
zh: 你们好！这是我的弟弟，乔治。

en: Hello, George.
I wish I had a little brother like George.
zh: 我希望我也有一个像乔治一样的弟弟。

en: Really?
Hello! I'm Danny Dog.
Is that a dinosaur?
It's just a toy dinosaur.
Brilliant!
Aaaah, really scary.
That's brilliant!
George is my brother.
He's brilliant.
Peppa is proud of her little brother, George.
zh: 佩奇为她的弟弟感到自豪。

en: Shall we show George how we paint pictures?
zh: 我们让乔治看看我们是怎么画画的？

en: George is not very good at painting.
Well, maybe you could help him?
zh: 那么，也许你能帮帮他吧？

en: Yes, I'm very good!
I will show him how to paint a flower.
zh: 我会教他怎么去画一朵小花。

en: George, today I'm going to teach you how to paint a flower.
zh: 乔治，今天我来教你怎么画一朵花。

en: First, you paint a big circle.
zh: 首先，你画一个大大的圆圈。

en: No, George, that's the wrong color.
Now you paint the flower's petals.
George! That's the wrong shape!
Now you paint the stalk and the leaves.
Perfect!
George, you've done it all wrong!
Now what do we have here?
zh: 你们画得怎么样了？（现在我们这里有什么画呢？）

en: I've painted a flower.
That's very good, Peppa.
And George has painted a dinosaur.
Brilliant!
I think George and Peppa's pictures should go on the wall.
zh: 我认为乔治和佩奇的画都应该挂在墙上。

en: Hurray!
Peppa, You must be very proud of your little brother.
zh: 佩奇，你的弟弟一定让你感到很自豪。

en: Yes, I am.
It is home time and the children's parents are here to pick them up.
zh: 放学了家长们来接小朋友回家了。

en: Can George come next time?
Yes, and he can paint us another lovely picture.
zh: 是的，他还能给我们画其它可爱的画。

en: And what will you paint next time, George?
zh: 乔治，你下次会画什么呢？

en: Dine-Saw!
Another dinosaur picture?
Well, maybe you can show us all how to paint a dinosaur?
zh: 好的，也许你可以教教大家如何去画恐龙。

en: Brilliant!
Yes! Brilliant!
